analyzed: tadā ayam atthā uti sayam avekkhiya

original: Na cāpi jhāpeti paraṁ na attanaṁ,

analyzed: sa vaṇṇa guttaḥ siriyā na dhasati
ye khattiyā se a nisamma kārinaḥ
itas vimuttāḥ api ca yanti duggati
dhamme ca ye ariya ppavedite ratā

original: Anuttarā te vacasā manasā kammunā ca;
analyzed: anuttarā te vacasā manasā kammunā ca
sirī ca lakkhī ca tava iva khattiya
ṭhita mariya vattī su vacaḥ a kodhanaḥ
itas vimuttaḥ api ca yāhi suggati
